titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Genieve Lamson Papers, circa 1918-1944
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Archives and Special Collections Library staff.

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Jason Kovari, 19 Mar 2009.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: The collection consists of notes taken by Genieve Lamson, Vassar College Professor of Geography 1922-1952, during her undergraduate studies at the University of Chicago. Also included are academic papers written by Vassar students attending Lamson's classes.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Genieve Lamson was was born on April 27, 1887. She attended the University of Chicago, where she received her B.S. (1920) and her M.S. (1922). She also studied at Columbia University in New York City. She was on the faculty of Vassar College in the Geography Department from 1922 until her retirement in 1952. She retired to Randolph, Vermont, where she died on September 25, 1966.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The Genieve Lamson Papers consist of notes taken by Lamson while she was a student at the Univeristy of Chicago in a class taught by Harlan H. Barrows called "Historical Geography of the United States." Also included are five academic papers written by Vassar students attending Lamson's classes.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials

p.archref: For additional biographical information, see the Vassar College Biographical Files Collection

relatedmaterial.p: Barrows, Harlan H., "Lectures on the Historical Geography of the United States as Given in 1933," edited by William A. Koelsch, University of Chicago, 1962.

odd.p: Finding aid encoded by Jason Kovari, March 2009. Updated by Emma Gronbeck, June 2023.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collection processed by Archives and Special Collections Library staff, 1990. Updated November 2006. Updated by Emma Gronbeck, June 2023.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Genieve Lamson Papers, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.
